Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit to the council reports of crime involving illegally obtained firearms.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the police department to submit to the council reports of crime involving illegally obtained firearms.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit to the council reports of crime involving illegally obtained firearms.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the police department to submit to the council reports of crime involving illegally obtained firearms.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
